id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

created_at.description: The date and time when the user was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the user was last updated.

email.description: The email address of the user.

telephone.description: The telephone number of the user.

language.description: The language spoken by the user.

academic_degree.description: The academic degree held by the user.

blood_type.description: The blood type of the user.

street_number.description: The street number of the user's address.

street_name.description: The name of the street of the user's address.

city.description: The city of residence of the user.

state.description: The state of the user's location.

province.description: The province of the user's location.

postal_code.description: The postal code of the user's address.

country_code.description: The country code of the user's location.
